This week I traveled to Buffalo New York along Lake Erie were the sky was cloaked in a constant gray missed allowing for just occasional peaks of the color police
The forecast was calling for the first snow fall of the year but for the good people of buffalo that's not even cause to wear a long sleeved shirt

I was picked up at the airport by a woman named Charlie she's been driving for twenty two years in a cab was filled with stuffed animals they lined the dashboard hung from the rear view mirror and the monkey was attached
Copilot she said some people have Jesus I have these guys she goes by Charlie because her father was hoping she'd be a boy I really think the name made me a bit of a tomboy when I was younger they don't say tomboy anymore now everybody is filled with gender fluids
